\doxysection{node\+\_\+modules/eslint-\/json-\/compat-\/utils Directory Reference}
\hypertarget{dir_87c35360c830c74e1ff4e5e6aebb6ec9}{}\label{dir_87c35360c830c74e1ff4e5e6aebb6ec9}\index{node\_modules/eslint-\/json-\/compat-\/utils Directory Reference@{node\_modules/eslint-\/json-\/compat-\/utils Directory Reference}}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
A utility that converts rules made for checking the AST of {\ttfamily jsonc-\/eslint-\/parser} into rules compatible with {\ttfamily @eslint/json}.\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md13007}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{Installation}{Installation}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md13007}

\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{npm\ install\ eslint-\/json-\/compat-\/utils}

\end{DoxyCode}
\hypertarget{README.md_autotoc_md13008}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{Usage}{Usage}}\label{README.md_autotoc_md13008}

\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{import\ \{\ toCompatRule\ \}\ from\ "{}eslint-\/json-\/compat-\/utils"{};}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{export\ default\ toCompatRule(\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ meta:\ \{\ /*\ ...\ */\ \},}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ create(context)\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ return\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ \ \ JSONArrayExpression:\ check,}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ \};}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \},}
\DoxyCodeLine{\})}

\end{DoxyCode}

Converts a plugin object for {\ttfamily jsonc-\/eslint-\/parser} into a plugin object for {\ttfamily @eslint/json} compatible.
